titleStmt.title: Carminvm proverbialium totius humanæ vitæ statum breviter delineantium, nec non utilem de moribus doctrinam jucundè proponentium, loci communes in gratiam juventutis selecti
titleStmt.author: S. A. I.

notesStmt.note: Introductory verses have salutation: S.A.I. ad emptorem.
